name: Space Planters
overview: Space Planters is a new game for the Commodore C64 computer. The game is developed by Wil (code), fieserWolf (music), Logiker, Neyvivi and Wil (pixels). It was originally released in 2020 and later updated Community Edition was released at Vintage Computing Carinthia $16. It was also released as part of the Space Collection for Bobr Games with new music and a new intro screen. Your goal is to create as many high level structures as possible. You get points for each one created and extra points for existing high-level structures so don't bomb them. Confined aliens transform into a strange alien device, 3 or more strange alien devices become an alien spaceship and 3 or more of those an alien space city. Three space rocks become a dwarf planet, three dwarf planets become a telluric planet and 3 of those become a habitable planet. Populate the galaxy!
